entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. A few rain showers and flurries beginning early this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
